verses.verse: In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> became his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: then he <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> against him <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees<s%>, and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>, and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%>, and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them against <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> it, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

Surely at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came this upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to <S%H5493>remove<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight<s%>, for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, according to all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>;

And also for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> that he <S%H8210>shed<s%>: for he <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H5545>pardon<s%>.

¶ Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697%H3117>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?
So <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> not <S%H3254>again<s%> any more out of his <S%H776>land<s%>: for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> all that pertained to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

¶ <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> was <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5179>Nehushta<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, according to all that his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

¶ At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H935%H4692>besieged<s%>.
And <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> did <S%H6696>besiege<s%> it.

And <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, he, and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and his <S%H5631>officers<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>.

And he carried <S%H3318>out<s%> thence all the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And he carried <S%H1540>away<s%> all <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1540>captives<s%>, and all the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths<s%>: none <S%H7604>remained<s%>, <S%H2108>save<s%> the poorest <S%H1803>sort<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And he carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H517>mother<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, and his <S%H5631>officers<s%>, and the <S%H352%H193>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, those <S%H3212>carried<s%> he into <S%H1473>captivity<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might<s%>, even <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, all that were <S%H1368>strong<s%> and <S%H6213>apt<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>, even them the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1473>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> his father's <S%H1730>brother<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his stead, and <S%H5437>changed<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>.

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, according to all that <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

For through the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it came to pass in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, until he had cast them <S%H7993>out<s%> from his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, that <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.
